status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

worklogs.comment:
robertnishihara opened a new pull request #2804: ARROW-3574: [Plasma] Use static libraries in plasma library.
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2804
 
 
   I missed one location in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2792. That previous PR fixed the issue on Linux but not on Mac. Without this PR, moving the `plasma_store_server` executable and then executing it leads to
   
   ```
   dyld: Library not loaded: @rpath/libarrow.12.dylib
     Referenced from: /Users/rkn/Workspace/ray/./python/ray/core/src/plasma/plasma_store_server
     Reason: image not found
   Abort trap: 6
   ```

----------------------------------------------------------------

wesm commented on a change in pull request #2804: ARROW-3574: [Plasma] Use static libraries in plasma library.
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2804#discussion_r226828722
 
 

 ##########
 File path: cpp/src/plasma/CMakeLists.txt
 ##########
 @@ -94,8 +94,8 @@ ADD_ARROW_LIB(plasma
   SOURCES ${PLASMA_SRCS}
   OUTPUTS PLASMA_LIBRARIES
   DEPENDENCIES gen_plasma_fbs
-  SHARED_LINK_LIBS ${FLATBUFFERS_STATIC_LIB} ${CMAKE_THREAD_LIBS_INIT} ${PLASMA_LINK_LIBS}
-  STATIC_LINK_LIBS ${FLATBUFFERS_STATIC_LIB} ${CMAKE_THREAD_LIBS_INIT} ${PLASMA_LINK_LIBS})
+  SHARED_LINK_LIBS ${FLATBUFFERS_STATIC_LIB} ${CMAKE_THREAD_LIBS_INIT} ${PLASMA_STATIC_LINK_LIBS}
 
 Review comment:
   I'm not sure this is right. I think `libplasma.so` should dynamically link to `libarrow.so`

robertnishihara commented on a change in pull request #2804: ARROW-3574: [Plasma] Use static libraries in plasma library.
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2804#discussion_r226832466
 
 

 ##########
 File path: cpp/src/plasma/CMakeLists.txt
 ##########
 @@ -94,8 +94,8 @@ ADD_ARROW_LIB(plasma
   SOURCES ${PLASMA_SRCS}
   OUTPUTS PLASMA_LIBRARIES
   DEPENDENCIES gen_plasma_fbs
-  SHARED_LINK_LIBS ${FLATBUFFERS_STATIC_LIB} ${CMAKE_THREAD_LIBS_INIT} ${PLASMA_LINK_LIBS}
-  STATIC_LINK_LIBS ${FLATBUFFERS_STATIC_LIB} ${CMAKE_THREAD_LIBS_INIT} ${PLASMA_LINK_LIBS})
+  SHARED_LINK_LIBS ${FLATBUFFERS_STATIC_LIB} ${CMAKE_THREAD_LIBS_INIT} ${PLASMA_STATIC_LINK_LIBS}
 
 Review comment:
   If we take that approach, is there any way to get `libarrow.so` to statically link into the `plasma_store_server` executable? Currently it is dynamically linked. cc @pcmoritz

wesm commented on a change in pull request #2804: ARROW-3574: [Plasma] Use static libraries in plasma library.
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2804#discussion_r226832768
 
 

 ##########
 File path: cpp/src/plasma/CMakeLists.txt
 ##########
 @@ -94,8 +94,8 @@ ADD_ARROW_LIB(plasma
   SOURCES ${PLASMA_SRCS}
   OUTPUTS PLASMA_LIBRARIES
   DEPENDENCIES gen_plasma_fbs
-  SHARED_LINK_LIBS ${FLATBUFFERS_STATIC_LIB} ${CMAKE_THREAD_LIBS_INIT} ${PLASMA_LINK_LIBS}
-  STATIC_LINK_LIBS ${FLATBUFFERS_STATIC_LIB} ${CMAKE_THREAD_LIBS_INIT} ${PLASMA_LINK_LIBS})
+  SHARED_LINK_LIBS ${FLATBUFFERS_STATIC_LIB} ${CMAKE_THREAD_LIBS_INIT} ${PLASMA_STATIC_LINK_LIBS}
 
 Review comment:
   You have to link plasma_static and arrow_static into the executable. You should not link libarrow.so with libplasma.a

xhochy commented on a change in pull request #2804: ARROW-3574: [Plasma] Use static libraries in plasma library.
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2804#discussion_r226872913
 
 

 ##########
 File path: cpp/src/plasma/CMakeLists.txt
 ##########
 @@ -94,8 +94,8 @@ ADD_ARROW_LIB(plasma
   SOURCES ${PLASMA_SRCS}
   OUTPUTS PLASMA_LIBRARIES
   DEPENDENCIES gen_plasma_fbs
-  SHARED_LINK_LIBS ${FLATBUFFERS_STATIC_LIB} ${CMAKE_THREAD_LIBS_INIT} ${PLASMA_LINK_LIBS}
-  STATIC_LINK_LIBS ${FLATBUFFERS_STATIC_LIB} ${CMAKE_THREAD_LIBS_INIT} ${PLASMA_LINK_LIBS})
+  SHARED_LINK_LIBS ${FLATBUFFERS_STATIC_LIB} ${CMAKE_THREAD_LIBS_INIT} ${PLASMA_STATIC_LINK_LIBS}
 
 Review comment:
   Definitely keep shared and static libs separate. Otherwise you will get segmentation faults at latest on unloading one of the libs as the exit handlers are called twice (once per static/shared).

----------------------------------------------------------------

pcmoritz closed pull request #2804: ARROW-3574: [Plasma] Use static libraries in plasma library.
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2804
 
 
   

This is a PR merged from a forked repository.
As GitHub hides the original diff on merge, it is displayed below for
the sake of provenance:

As this is a foreign pull request (from a fork), the diff is supplied
below (as it won't show otherwise due to GitHub magic):

diff --git a/cpp/src/plasma/CMakeLists.txt b/cpp/src/plasma/CMakeLists.txt
index d6975914d6..0928249a78 100644
--- a/cpp/src/plasma/CMakeLists.txt
+++ b/cpp/src/plasma/CMakeLists.txt
@@ -86,7 +86,7 @@ set(PLASMA_STATIC_LINK_LIBS arrow_static)
 
 if (ARROW_GPU)
   set(PLASMA_LINK_LIBS ${PLASMA_LINK_LIBS} arrow_gpu_shared)
-  set(PLASMA_STATIC_LINK_LIBS ${PLASMA_STATIC_LINK_LIBS} arrow_static)
+  set(PLASMA_STATIC_LINK_LIBS ${PLASMA_STATIC_LINK_LIBS} arrow_gpu_static)
   add_definitions(-DPLASMA_GPU)
 endif()
 
@@ -95,7 +95,7 @@ ADD_ARROW_LIB(plasma
   OUTPUTS PLASMA_LIBRARIES
   DEPENDENCIES gen_plasma_fbs
   SHARED_LINK_LIBS ${FLATBUFFERS_STATIC_LIB} ${CMAKE_THREAD_LIBS_INIT} ${PLASMA_LINK_LIBS}
-  STATIC_LINK_LIBS ${FLATBUFFERS_STATIC_LIB} ${CMAKE_THREAD_LIBS_INIT} ${PLASMA_LINK_LIBS})
+  STATIC_LINK_LIBS ${FLATBUFFERS_STATIC_LIB} ${CMAKE_THREAD_LIBS_INIT} ${PLASMA_STATIC_LINK_LIBS})
 
 foreach(LIB_TARGET ${PLASMA_LIBRARIES})
   target_compile_definitions(${LIB_TARGET}
